Html:
hi guys,

I found this site is very useful for my report while I really have no idea how to do the Harvard referencing style.

This is the example of the style that my instructor want me to do.

Smith, A. & Jones, B. (2007) “How to write a report”. Journal of Report Writing Vol 6 num3 p 65 -71. Accessed 17/3/10 URL: http://www.icmeorganisers.dk/tsg06/BackgroundPapers/rubenson2.pdf

Do you have any idea that which one is the best for me?

Thank you in advance.

Probably none. There is no such thing as a Harvard style. They are all variations on the author-date theme. You could start from one of the Harvard styles offered here, but you will have to finetune it for your specific institution. The Exeter version starts with "author (year) ..." so that one might be a good starting point.
